entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
